name: CentOS Bootstrap
tagline: Hassle-free way to bootstrap CentOS 6.3 with development packages.
body:
Bootstrap your **CentOS 6.3** machine with some commonly-desired awesomeness.

## Usage

If you want to install just one module, run:

```bash
$ bash bootstrap-<module>
```

### Supported Modules

* hubot
* mysql
* nginx (with passenger)
* node (v0.10.4)
* ocaml
* postgres
* redis (v2.6.7)
* RVM
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
